name: Black Large Nitrile Gloves Case of 1000 - Medical Grade - Latex-Free, Powder-Free - Disposable Nitrile Gloves - Medical Exam, Lab, and Industrial Use
short_description: These nitrile exam gloves are medical grade and are perfect for professional medical office settings, or have them on hand to go in first aid kits.
Thick and stretchy so they don't rip or tear easily, these 3 mil disposable rubber gloves go on easily and are super comfy to wear.
Our nitrile gloves offer great grip and handling as you work. They also have textured tips that can be used on tablets and touchscreens
Perfect for people with latex allergies, these latex free gloves will not cause allergic reactions. They are also powder-free, ambidextrous, and non-sterile. For single use only.
These disposable gloves are perfect to buy in bulk. The cases come with 10 boxes of 100 gloves. They are available in sizes small- extra large and in blue and black.

short_description: The ideal solution for individuals sensitive to natural rubber latex and donning powder.

Extraordinary strength, stretchable durability and puncture resistance with premium iris blue color.
Commonly used by law enforcement professionals, tattoo artists, physicians and first responders.
Features smooth external finish and beaded cuff for extra durability.

name: Herkules Grip Heavy Duty 8Mil Orange Nitrile Gloves,3D Raised Diamond Texture-Latex & Powder Free-Industrial, Mechanic (1, X-Large)
short_description: ULTIMATE PROTECTION: Unleash the power of 8mil ultra-thick industrial-grade nitrile gloves. When only the best will suffice, these heavy-duty nitrile disposable gloves provide protection against rips, punctures, and a wide range of chemicals. With HERKULES GRIP Gloves, you're equipped to tackle challenges head-on, whether you're in auto repair, airplane mechanics, oil changes, plumbing, painting, janitorial services, cleaning, food preparation, or roles within the police and law enforcement.

🌪️ RAISED HERKULES GRIP DIAMOND TEXTURE: Elevate your grip game with our innovative raised diamond textured design orange gloves, now with 60% better gripping power! Experience superior tactile movement and an unyielding grip that's engineered to conquer any task. The unique texture channels liquids away, ensuring a secure, slip-free hold. These chemical-resistant work gloves inspire the confidence you need to handle any scenario securely and safely even when using touch screen devices.

🟠 HIGH-VISIBILITY ADVANTAGE: Safety meets style in vibrant orange. Our bright 8-mil orange nitrile glove color offers unmatched visibility. Our protective gloves enhance your personal safety in various environments. The striking orange color is designed to stand out, ensuring that you're easily spotted in high-risk situations, low-light conditions, or busy work environments- It's not just a glove, it's a statement of your commitment to safety.

💎 PREMIUM CRAFTSMANSHIP: Step back to the era of nitrile gloves that were synonymous with durability and strength. Our HERKULES GRIP Heavy-Duty disposable gloves proudly carry forward the legacy of a time when latex-free and powder-free gloves were built to last, stand up to rigorous demands, and offer unwavering protection. Designed with the highest quality material, these rubber gloves provide superior durability, ensuring you have the security and robustness demanded by any task.

📦 VERSATILE SIZING AND BULK OPTIONS: Available in five sizes (Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, and XXL) and designed with an ambidextrous fit, our orange heavy-duty industrial nitrile gloves 8 mil are available in convenient packaging options. You can choose between a box of 100, 200 gloves or a bulk case of 1000 gloves, ensuring you have an ample supply of reliable personal protective equipment for an extended period.
